General.Name: Shane Global Holding Inc
General.Description: Shane Global Holding Inc. research, develops, produces, and sells indoor furniture in Taiwan, the United States, Mainland China. The company offers sofas, chairs, beds, benches and ottomans, recliners and chaise, tables, cabinets; and sofa covers and other leather products. It sells its products to retail stores in North America. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.97, Dunhua S. Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 106045

3.Name: Mr. Cheng-Fa  Li
